titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the marriage penalty in the contribution rules for Roth IRAs.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the marriage penalty in the contribution rules for Roth IRAs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise Roth individual retirement account (IRA) contribution rules to eliminate the marriage penalty.
